entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Cape Race overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Cape Race in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
